name: Slayer (2022)
description:
Build your hand eye coordination in a new fun way!
Slay out for as long as you can and reach your highest potential!

Be one with your mouse!
A unique control scheme that gives you outstanding maneuverability, speed and accuracy!

Click & swipe enemies down but be careful not to get hit!
Choose perks that best suit your personal playstyle or build something unique that will stand the test of time!

Feel the power and slay countless hordes of enemies!
Attempt to obtain a high score that would position you as a top Slayer!
